title: UConn Football Vs. USF In 2015 Homecoming Game
text:
Caption UConn Football Vs. USF Brad Horrigan / Hartford Courant Connecticut Huskies quarterback Bryant Shirreffs (4) carries the ball against South Florida at Pratt & Whitney Stadium at Rentschler Field Saturday. USF won the game 28-20.
